column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Young Zuko says : " Hey Mom , want to see how Azula feeds turtle ducks ? "
#Text=Ursa says : " Zuko !
#Text=Ow ow !
#Text=Ouch !
#Text=" Young Zuko says : " Stupid turtle duck .
#Text=Why she 'd do that ?
#Text=" Ursa says : " Zuko .
#Text=That 's what moms are like .
#Text=If you mess with their babies , , they 're gon na bite you back !
#Text=" Young Ty Lee says : " Ugh !
#Text=Azula !
#Text=" Young Azula says : " Watch this !
#Text=Mom !
#Text=Can you make Zuko play with us ?
#Text=We need equal teams to play a game !
#Text=" Young Zuko says : " I am not cart - wheeling .
#Text=" Young Azula says : " You wo n't have to .
#Text=Cart - wheeling 's not a game , dum - dum .
#Text=" Young Zuko says : " I do n't care .
#Text=I do n't want to play with you !
#Text=" Young Azula says : " We are brother and sister .
#Text=It 's important for us to spend time together !
#Text=Do n't you think so , Mom ?
#Text=" Ursa says : " Yes , darling , I think it 's a good idea to play with your sister .
#Text=Go on now , just for a little while .
#Text=" Young Azula says : " Here 's the way it goes .
#Text=Now what you do is , try to knock the apple off the other person 's head , like this .
#Text=" Young Azula says : " See , I told you it would work !
#Text="
